body.name: Pura Kiki 5oz/150ml Stainless Steel Anti-Colic Infant Bottle w/Silicone Natural Vent Nipple & Sleeve, 100% Plastic-Free, MadeSafe Certified, Medical-Grade Silicone - Rose Sleeve
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 6 hrs 19 mins
features: WHY PURA? We are the first and only line of plastic-free juvenile bottles that has achieved the MADESAFE Certified rating. Our revolutionary design not only eliminates plastic components but provides much-improved functionality. Pura focuses on safety, durability, ease of use, and eco-progressive consumption. Our One Life… One Bottle systems are a great way to help save our planet and help rid our oceans of waste.

INFANT FEEDING TO KIDS WATER BOTTLE: Baby Grows...Bottle Evolves: This bottle transforms into a sippy bottle, straw bottle, or sport/water bottle by simply swapping the nipple out for another Pura silicone lid.

WE PUT KIDS SAFETY AND SUSTAINABILITY FIRST: We keep petroleum-based plastics out of our kids' mouths, create repurpose-able solutions that are infinitely superior to single-use or recyclable offerings, and do it all in a fun, modern, and colorful way. No seal, no dot, no lead!

NATURAL VENT NIPPLE AND SILICONE COMPONENTS: Includes soft silicone travel cover, bright-colored sleeve, and medium flow nipple with anti-colic vent tube. Our innovative soft tops ensure no more chipped teeth.

MIX AND MATCH BOTTLES, LIDS, SLEEVES, AND ACCESSORIES: All products are compatible with other Pura silicone components and accessories. We ensure there is no need to discard and replace your bottles as your child matures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderdul stainess stell bottle!
reviews.reviewText: Worth the price! Great easy to clean stainless bottle. Great for small hands non breakable and keeps items fresh long term, stays cold

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe and durable
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Pura Kiki after reading the recommendation from BabyGearLab.com in 2016. I was searching for a good "sippy cup" since all the mainstream ones at the store were disappointing. I realized these cups (Munchkins, The First Years, etc) were extremely difficult to drink from and leaked. I was hesitant to give Pura a try because of the cost but I'm glad I did.First off, I love that these are PURE. There is absolutely no plastic! Plastic is something we eliminated in our kitchen years ago but it crept up again since having children. With Pura I don't have to worry about plastic leaching into my child's drink.They are durable and look almost as good as the day we bought them. They recommend to replace the silicone spouts overtime, but we haven't done so because they're still fine. I have sterilized them a few times in boiling water for 5 minutes. In one of our houses, we had tile floors in the dining room and my daughter would knock the cup off which resulted in a few dings on the bottom. This is one of the downsides to this material. At times we were worried the tile would crack, but it never did. It is leak proof BUT if there's liquid in the spout at the tip where they suck and it drops or they flick it then a few drops will come out. Other than that, you can shake the cup and tip it upside down and nothing comes out.It's expensive but it grows with the child, is safe material, and lasts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for warming milk FAST
reviews.reviewText: Since it's not insulated, it can warm up milk from the fridge extremely quickly. Just put it in warm water and it works amazingly fast.This is great for when baby is hangry and need to prepare a bottle really fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good looking.
reviews.reviewText: Great for newborn. No worries about micro-plastic. The removable silicone exterior sleeve makes for a good grip which helps as your baby gets a little more wiggly. Beautiful colors!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good stainless steel bottle but not perfect
reviews.reviewText: Pros:1. Stainless steel - Website says its free of toxic chemicals and certainly BPA, BPS free2. Easy to clean3. Durability - I think its good enoughCons:1. The nipples are either soft and slow Or the fast flow ones are very hard. So my baby got tired of sucking. I am using Dr. Browns nipples which fit perfectly.2. Its not leakproof.. I have to make sure the bottle does not tilt and the lid is secured the right way.3. I haven't tested this for longer time like a day but if I store milk in this bottle for 4-5 hours it smells different. I have read we can sterilize the bottle in a solution with water and vinegar .. will try that to see if that changes anythingOverall , I like that I can send this bottle to the daycare (since they wont accept Glass) instead of plastic ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was the only bottle we ended up using. I loved that it could stay cool on those super hot days. And she eventually was able to hold it with the help of the grip. Easy to clean and stored in the diaper bag great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and toxin free
reviews.reviewText: Love so much that I buy them as gifts. Lightweight, safe with no plastic. It’s very important to me to not use toxic products with my kids. Very convenient to go from bottle to straw to sippy and much less waste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My children love these cups
reviews.reviewText: If you only use water it’s amazing but if you put juice in it it will start smelling like it fermented after a day so regular washing is a must but aside from the obvious it functions at it should and we will continue to order them and replacing parts as needed.

This is one of the best products amazon is selling. Right from the first purs kiki bottle I purchased for myself, I don’t forget to suggest and even gift my friends this bottle.The only problem I found is with the nipples. They break easily specially if your baby is teething. So I had to buy 2 sets in a 1.5 years span.
expensive but good quality and perfectly designed

reviews.reviewTitle: Happy with the Product as stainless steel is any day ...
reviews.reviewText: Happy with the Product as stainless steel is any day better than plastic. Given that it's an imported product, the price seems to be on the higher side. Maybe the vendor should look at optimizing the price so that its affordable.
